original_text: “Then they journeyed through the wilderness and went around the land of Edom and the land of Moab and arrived on the east side of the land of Moab and camped on the other side of the Arnon. But they did not enter the territory of Moab, for the Arnon was the boundary of Moab.
korean_text: 그 후에 광야를 지나 에돔 땅과 모압 땅을 돌아서 모압 땅의 해 뜨는 쪽으로 들어가 아르논 저쪽에 진 쳤고 아르논은 모압의 경계이므로 모압 지역 안에는 들어가지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Then they journeyed through the wilderness
and went around the land of Edom
and arrived on the east side of the land of Moab
and camped on the other side of the Arnon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아르논 강 건너편에 진을 쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: But they did not enter the territory of Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 모압의 영토에 들어가지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: for the Arnon was the boundary of Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 아르논 강이 모압의 경계였기 때문입니다
